q: worked with Donald Rumsfeld in his six years in the Pentagon under George W. Bush George H. W. Bush . To buttress his account, Donald Rumsfeld has begun to place a selection of his papers on a website, www.Donald Rumsfeld.com, which, he writes, accompanies and supports this memoir. The site contains some startling additions to the public record across administrations. Take for example this never-before-released glimpse backstage at the White House, circa fall 1975, as Donald Rumsfeld and Dick Cheney administer tough love to George W. Bush

pay the high interest rates the government set as part of its$ 15 billion Chrysler bailout.`` We had no choice... I am going to pay the shyster loans.'' He called the loans a thorn in my side. Sergio Marchionne even manages to get his insult wrong.`` Shyster'' refers to attorneys, not lenders. He may have meant`` shylock,'' which is slang for loan sharks, which is itself slang

this week. Gary Moore had no timetable for Allen Iverson 's surgery, only that that it was`` soon.''`` People need to know that Allen Iverson is and always has been a fighter,'' Gary Moore said. He's got a battle ahead of him. Gary Moore said Allen Iverson `` totally disputes'' reports out of Turkey that he was set to retire. The 11-time NBA All-Star has said he's happy with his new career in Turkey, though his start has been mixed

Robotized Engine for the Fiat 500 minicar, which is going into production on the old Chrysler PT Cruiser assembly line in Toluca, Mexico. Chrysler Kokomo is preparing to make the Fiat's engine blocks. It's a rumor on the table that we're supposed to make parts for the( Fiat) transmission, said UAW 1166 official Jeff LaDow at the Kokomo casting plant.`` Right now, we're still getting the engine block squared away.'' current workers are located. In a speech Tuesday, Mr. Eric Schmidt said Google will hire more than 1,000 workers in Europe this year. All told, Google has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google's senior vice Barack Obama of engineering and research. Even if it surpasses 31,000 employees this year, Google will still have far fewer people than Microsoft Corp., probably its fiercest rival.

NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . And Aaron Rodgers is getting even more MVP treatment tonight, where you can catch him on The Late Show with David Letterman . The show starts at 10:35 p.m. tonight, right after Channel
